loan.name: Sophal
loan.use: to buy a biodigester for producing more crops with the use of its by-product, organic fertilizer.
loan.description:
Sophal is a farmer who grows rice, cashew and cassava. Faming is very important for him and his family. Currently he spends about $300 per year on chemical fertilizer. He worries about the quality of the soil because chemical fertilizer could make the soil quality worse.

He wants to use natural fertilizer so he decided to buy a biodigester because it not only produces gas for cooking but also produces good fertilizer for the soil.

He is requesting a loan to buy a biodigester because he wants to improve the quality of his soil and reduce his fertilizer costs.
loan.whySpecial: This loan is special because it enables rural populations to access life-changing cooking technology
